00017 class Ticks {
00018     public:
00020         Ticks() : m_ticks(0) {}
00021 
00023         Ticks(UINT32 ms) { SetMilliSeconds(ms); }
00024 
00026         Ticks(const Ticks &ticks) : m_ticks(ticks.m_ticks) {}
00027 
00029         explicit Ticks(const TickValue& tick_value) : m_ticks(tick_value.Get()) {}
00030 
00032         void SetEmpty() { m_ticks = 0; }
00033 
00035         BOOLEAN IsEmpty() const { return m_ticks == 0; }
00036 
00038         UINT32 GetExpiredTime() const;
00039 
00041         UINT32 GetExpiredTime(const Ticks &ticks) const;

00043         Ticks& operator =(const Ticks &ticks) { m_ticks = ticks.m_ticks; return *this; }
00044 
00046         Ticks operator +(const Ticks &ticks) const {
00047             Ticks sum;
00048             sum.m_ticks = m_ticks + ticks.m_ticks;
00049             return sum;
00050         }
00051 
00053         Ticks& operator +=(const Ticks &ticks) { m_ticks += ticks.m_ticks; return *this; }
00054 
00056         Ticks operator -(const Ticks &ticks) const {
00057             Ticks diff;
00058             diff.m_ticks = m_ticks - ticks.m_ticks;
00059             return diff;
00060         }
00061 
00063         Ticks& operator -=(const Ticks &ticks) { m_ticks -= ticks.m_ticks; return *this; }
00064 
00066         BOOLEAN operator ==(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks == ticks.m_ticks; }
00067 
00069         BOOLEAN operator !=(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks != ticks.m_ticks; }
00070 
00072         BOOLEAN operator >(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks > ticks.m_ticks; }
00073 
00075         BOOLEAN operator <(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks < ticks.m_ticks; }
00076 
00078         BOOLEAN operator >=(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks >= ticks.m_ticks; }
00079 
00081         BOOLEAN operator <=(const Ticks &ticks) const { return m_ticks <= ticks.m_ticks; }
00082 
00084         static Ticks Infinite() {
00085             Ticks ticks;
00086             ticks.m_ticks = ULONG_MAX;
00087             return ticks;
00088         }
00089 
00090     private:

00092
